title: The answer of His Excellency the Earle of Newcastle, to a late declaration of the Lord Fairefax dated the 8. of June, 1643.
author: Newcastle, William Cavendish, Duke of, 1592-1676.
notes: At foot of title page: By speciall command.
Caption title on p. 3 reads: The answer of his Excellency the Earle of New-Castle to a declaration of the Lord Fairefax, &c.
Reproduction of the original in the Trinity College Library, Cambridge.
